title: Trudeau opts to replace Bank of Canada Governor Poloz despite COVID-19 economic crisis - The Globe and Mail
description: Stephen Poloz’s current seven-year mandate ends on June 2 but there was no indication that the government wanted him to extend his stay, according to sources
content:
BoC Governor Stephen Poloz speaks during a news conference in Ottawa on March 27. In recent weeks, the central bank launched a flurry of measures as the Canadian economy plunged into recession over the spread of the novel coronavirus.
Adrian Wyld/The Canadia… [+7872 chars]
